title: Binance Coin (BNB) Price Under FUD Pressure: Will It Retreat to $220 Support? - CoinGape
content:
Amid the rising indecisiveness in the crypto market, the Binance coin price has witnessed a sideways trend for the past three weeks. This consolidation of around $240 with short-bodies and long wicks indicates no initiation from buyers or sellers. However, despite a highly volatile behavior, the coin price respects the inverted flag pattern formation, characterized by a steady downfall and an upward channel to replenish bearish momentum. Will this chart setup bring major correction in the fourth largest cryptocurrency?

Also Read: Binance Expands Support For Dogecoin, DOGE Price Rally To $0.1 Coming?

advertisement

Binance Price Daily Chart

The higher price rejection candle on August 8th indicates a high supply zone at $248.3

A breakdown below the support trendline will trigger a major correction in BNB

The intraday trading volume in the BNB coin is $510.2 Million, indicating a 19% gain

Source- Tradingview

By the press time, the Binance coin price traded at $244.6 and continued with its sideways action in a narrow range. The daily chart showed multiple Doii-type candles which project uncertainty among market participants.

Currently, the coin price is resonating between the horizontal resistance of $248.3 and the rising trendline of the flag channel. Until these two levels are intact, the consolidation mode in the BNB will be extended longer.

Considering a bullish outlook, if the coin price gives an upside breakout from the $248.3 resistance, the buyers will get a strong footing to rise higher. The potential upswing could raise the altcoin 9% higher to reach $270.

Will Rising FUD Push BNB Price Back to $200?

In theory, the inverted flag pattern is known to extend the correction trend upon the breakdown of the channel pattern. If the coin price breaks below the lower support with a daily candle, the bearish will intensify. The post-breakdown fall would tumble the prices to $220, followed by $200.

Bollinger Band: The narrow gap of the Bollinger Band indicator reflects high volatility in the crypto market

Directional Moving Index: A bullish crossover between the DI+(blue) and DI-(orange) slope hints at increasing buying pressure in the market.

title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin rises above $29,700 ahead of US inflation data; Shiba Inu, Solana surge up to - The Economic Times
content: The crypto tokens were trading higher in Wednesday's trade ahead of key US inflation data. Bitcoin (BTC) rose 1.62% to $29,727, whereas Ethereum (ETH) was above the 1,850 level.BTC volume stood at approximately $18.1 billion, rising 34.35% in the last 24 hours."Bitcoin’s price breached the $30000 mark in the early hours of today but consolidated to trading above the $29500 level. This movement could be because of the fall in Chinese trade numbers for July and the U.S. 10-year Treasury yield descending lower by 11 basis points to 3.98%," Edul Patel, Co-founder and CEO at Mudrex, said.Other top crypto tokens, BNB , XRP, Dogecoin , Solana, Polygon, and Polkadot were also trading higher on Wednesday.Meanwhile, the global cryptocurrency market cap was trading higher, around $1.18 trillion, rising 1.49% in the last 24 hours.The market cap of Bitcoin, the world's largest cryptocurrency, was around $578 billion. Bitcoin's dominance is currently 48.93%, an increase of 0.12% over the day, according to CoinMarketCap."BTC managed to break the $30k resistance level but failed to sustain the momentum, and is currently trading around $29.7k. Given its recent performance, BTC’s support level has been gradually increasing. If BTC continues to trade in a narrow range, it may find strong support at $29k itself in the coming weeks. This could provide a good base for a strong move that may follow," Shubham Hudda, Senior Manager at CoinSwitch Markets Desk, said.Rajagopal Menon, Vice President at WazirX, said, "Major market oscillators point toward a Buy sentiment. The Relative Strength Index (14), one of the key indicators, sits at 54, with a neutral outlook. The Stochastic %K (14, 3, 3) and the Average Directional Index (14) is at 62 and 15, respectively, further indicating a Neutral market.""The MACD Level (12, 26) at -90 indicates a Buy. The Stochastic RSI Fast (3, 3, 14, 14) is at 76 with a Neutral indicator, while the Williams Percent Range (14) at −30 signals Neutral," Menon added.Crypto Cart: Quick Glance (Source: coinmarketcap.com , data as of 11.25 hours, IST on August 9, 2023)Bitcoin $29,727 1.62%Ethereum $1,856 1.27%Tether $0.9995 0.06%BNB $244 0.94%XRP $0.6448 3.22%Cardano $0.2981 1.99%Dogecoin $0.07498 1.46%Solana $24.4 5.03%Polygon $0.6911 3.27% Litecoin $84.04 1.64%Polkadot $5.05 1.43%Tron $0.07659 -0.22%Shiba Inu $0.000009627 7.07%(Note: Price change in last 24 hours)(Disclaimer: Recommendations, suggestions, views and opinions given by the experts are their own. These do not represent the views of The Economic Times)

title: BNB Price Prediction: Binance Token Could Eclipse Records; Wall Street Memes Draws Attention - Inside Bitcoins
content:
Don’t invest unless prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment, you shouldn’t expect to be protected if something goes wrong.

Join Our Telegram channel to stay up to date on breaking news coverage

Binance Token (BNB) might reach record highs soon, showing impressive growth potential. Currently, BNB is trading at $244.76 with a 24-hour volume of 503.574 million, up by 1%. Over the past month, BNB’s price has increased by almost 5%.

On the other hand, the attention from Wall Street Memes is adding to the buzz around BNB‘s potential rise. Investors are watching closely for potential gains in the coming days.

BNB Price Update: Active Trading and Possible Upside Momentum

Currently, BNB is priced at around $244.76, and there has been a lot of trading activity in the past 24 hours. Some experts think that BNB might go up.

When you look at the chart, you’ll notice a green candlestick shape, which indicates that more people are buying BNB than selling it today.

The numbers show that BNB’s price could go up in the short and long term because it’s trading higher than the average lines for the past 30 and 50 days. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) number is 53.45, which is in the middle. This might mean that BNB’s price could stay above $250 for some time.

BNB is facing a bit of a challenge at $249.30—it’s like a point where people hesitate to buy. This could push the price up before the weekend or vice versa. But there’s good news too! If the price reaches $249.30, more people might want to buy, which could increase the price.

Traders should keep an eye on these numbers. Something important might happen if the price goes above or below these levels.

Although BNB is doing well, the Wall Street Memes presale is also an exciting option. It’s getting much attention and could be a good pick for investors looking for something different from BNB.

WSM Token Presale: Impressive $22.550M Raised, Potential for High Returns

The Wall Street Memes token, or WSM, is shaking things up in the crypto market after a successful presale. They’d collected an impressive $22.550 million by August 9.

This all began with a challenge to Wall Street in 2021. Now, in 2023, they’ve started the WSM token presale. With over 1 million members on social media, they’re likely to be listed on major crypto exchanges.

This idea is essential because they want to help and support the community. They’re doing this by setting aside 30% of the tokens for rewards, which could include things like airdrops.

Competent experts think that when WSM gets listed on an exchange, it could make a lot of money. So, this presale could be a good chance for intelligent investors. Backed by solid basics, WSM’s path reveals exciting chances for big profits.

A recent jump past $20 million, boosted partly by a significant investment from a crypto “whale,” brings the project nearer to its $30 million limit. With so much attention, this limit will likely be reached soon.

The investor’s secret identity adds mystery, and some think a big crypto influencer might be involved. This support has made WSM one of the standout crypto opportunities in 2023. If you’re interested, join the Wall Street Memes Discord group and do social media tasks to get some of the $50,000 worth of $WSM tokens.

Each token costs $0.0331, which could be a good deal for clever investors. But don’t wait too long – as the presale end gets closer, getting involved is a good idea before Wall Street Memes appear in the market.

title: BNB Chain Upgrading but Fails to Pump BNB Price, Borroe's Vision and Prospects Attracting Crypto Whales - BSC NEWS
content:
BNB

Borroe ($ROE) continues to gain attention as a promising contender in the cryptocurrency market, offering an innovative approach to funding.

Despite the recent upgrades to the Binance smart chain, the expected surge in Binance Coin's (BNB) price has been elusive. On the other hand, new entrants to the cryptocurrency market are attracting significant attention.

One of these promising contenders is Borroe ($ROE), a pioneering platform in the Web3 ecosystem, whose innovative approach and lucrative prospects are drawing in crypto whales from all corners of the market.

Borroe’s Vision and Prospects Are Attracting Crypto Whales

The cryptocurrency market has always been a magnet for those willing to take calculated risks in anticipation of substantial returns. Among these risk-takers are the 'crypto whales', investors with significant assets who have the power to shape market trends. These savvy investors have recently been turning their attention towards Borroe, and it's not hard to see why.

At the heart of Borroe is a transformative vision: to redefine the norms of traditional funding and unlock capital for innovative businesses.

Utilizing blockchain technology, Borroe allows businesses to raise funds using their future or outstanding income, which they can trade as Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) at a discount. This approach not only provides immediate liquidity for businesses but also opens up unique investment opportunities for investors.

Borroe's presale of its native token, $ROE, has already seen remarkable success, selling out swiftly and giving early investors substantial returns. The Beta stage was completed successfully, selling all allocated $ROE tokens at $0.01.

Currently in the first presale stage, the price increased by 25% and over 30% of the allocated tokens have already been sold. The price is designed to increase incrementally in each stage, with estimated 300% gains for early investors by the end of the presale stages.

For these reasons, it’s not hard to see that crypto whales are gravitating towards Borroe, recognizing its potential to be a game-changer in the industry.

BNB Chain is Upgrading but BNB Price Fails to Pump

In the second quarter, the BNB Chain experienced a series of significant upgrades aimed at enhancing security and usability, including the Planck and Luban hard forks. In terms of usability, one notable achievement is the development of the OpBNB, based on Optimism's Stack, which serves as a Layer 2 solution to enhance data caching, optimization, and block mining.

However, these promising technical advancements weren't mirrored by a corresponding rise in the value of Binance Coin (BNB). In fact, the price of BNB didn't experience the anticipated upward momentum, due mainly to the regulatory scrutiny that Binance faced from authorities such as the SEC. This cast a cloud of uncertainty over Binance's financial performance and token value, leading to a dip in its overall financial standing.

Despite this setback, the BNB Chain continues to demonstrate its robustness and adaptability. As it looks to the future, plans such as the integration of the Zero Knowledge rollup (zkBNB) alongside the OpBNB and the introduction of a new validator model—aiming to increase mining participants—suggest that BNB Chain's future remains promising.

Summary

In the ever-evolving cryptocurrency landscape, the balance of power is continuously shifting. Despite recent challenges, Binance Coin still has potential for growth, thanks to ongoing enhancements to the BNB Chain.

However, it's also clear that newcomers like Borroe, with its innovative approach to funding and proven appeal to high-net-worth investors, cannot be overlooked.

Borroe's native token, $ROE, is already generating buzz in the market, promising a unique combination of security, growth potential, and investor benefits. This represents a golden opportunity for those ready to embrace the future of decentralized finance.

Therefore, don't miss your chance to be part of this exciting journey. Join the $ROE presale today and step into the future of Web3 finance with Borroe!
